basicInfo.notes: Founded November 2019 in Wilmington, DE. Fast-growing independent web host. Cloud SSD infrastructure with 9 data centers globally. Known for excellent support (4.9 Trustpilot) and beginner-friendly approach. Free daily backups on all plans. Uses LiteSpeed web servers for performance.

serverPerformance.ddosProtectionLevel: DDoS protection included on all plans

policiesOverages.bandwidthOveragePolicy: Unlimited bandwidth; fair use policy applies
policiesOverages.accountSuspensionPolicy: Violation of ToS; excessive resource usage
policiesOverages.resourceAbuseDefinition: Inode limits; CPU/RAM abuse; malicious activity
policiesOverages.hiddenFeesNotes: Aggressive renewal pricing (300%+ increase); Free domain only for first year; 45-day refund is generous; LiteSpeed included is valuable; Daily backups free

contentRestrictions.contentNotes: Strict content policy; No adult, gambling, or high-resource file hosting

editorial.knownIssues: Very high renewal prices (300%+ increase from promo); Founded 2019 so less track record than established hosts; No PCI/HIPAA compliance; Strict content policy may limit some uses
editorial.bestFor: Beginners wanting excellent support; WordPress users wanting LiteSpeed performance; Small businesses needing reliable hosting; Users prioritizing support quality over price; Those wanting included daily backups
editorial.avoidIf: Price-sensitive after first term; Need PCI/HIPAA compliance; Want to host adult/gambling content; Need longer track record
editorial.competitorComparisonNotes: Exceptional Trustpilot (4.9) and G2 (4.8); LiteSpeed + NVMe performance; Founded 2019 but growing fast; 45-day money-back generous; Competes with SiteGround, A2 Hosting, ChemiCloud; Better support but higher renewal

comparisonData.uniqueSellingPoint: Exceptional support (4.9 Trustpilot) with LiteSpeed performance and free daily backups on cloud SSD infrastructure
comparisonData.idealCustomerProfile: Beginner or small business prioritizing excellent support and reliable WordPress hosting with LiteSpeed performance

faqContent.faqIsThisHostGood: HostArmada is excellent for beginners and WordPress users. Exceptional Trustpilot (4.9) and G2 (4.8) ratings. Founded 2019 but rapidly growing reputation.
faqContent.faqWhoOwnsThisHost: HostArmada is an independent, privately-held company founded in November 2019. Headquartered in Wilmington, Delaware.
faqContent.faqHowMuchDoesItCost: Starting at $2.49/month promo, renewing at $9.95/month. VPS from $41.21/month. 45-day money-back guarantee.
faqContent.faqIsItBeginnerFriendly: Yes, very beginner-friendly with excellent 24/7 support, cPanel, and one-click WordPress installation.
faqContent.faqDoesItIncludeEmail: Yes, unlimited email accounts with webmail access and spam filtering on all plans.
faqContent.faqCanIHostWordPress: Yes, WordPress-optimized hosting with LiteSpeed cache, staging, and auto-updates.
faqContent.faqWhatsTheUptime: 99.9% uptime guarantee with SLA credits for downtime.
faqContent.faqCanICancelAnytime: Yes, 45-day money-back guarantee. Monthly billing available.
